list.name: Default
list.comment: basic working version, MQTT and HTTPS

task.summary: Implement a scheduler to execute Signal invocations.
Use CallerRunsPolicy for thread pool executor.
Make signals step-before instead of step-after and respect ordering of signal items in tight signals.
Add bouncy castle dependency to pom.
Clean up dependencies and remove Sun stuff that slipped in there somehow.
Add device code and provenance properties; add getters and setters throughout.
basic working version, MQTT and HTTPS
